label: e Qo{'} ne sag rēn sag kēkē \textbfë sag wo e raga {'i-{'}isi-gi} anē van rōw lē =n vunuō.
trs: So Qo{'} was now stuck up there (in the tree). Sat (there) while his brothers went down to the village. (They stole his wife and his canoe, and paddled off with it.)'	 JJQ.151--152
